summary: The diff addresses REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 through changes to AdminInitButton.tsx and useQueries.ts. REQ-4 (backend isAdmin audit) shows no evidence of backend file changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit the backend isAdmin check to ensure it correctly identifies the calling principal as an admin. Verify the admin principal is stored and compared correctly so that admin users are not incorrectly treated as non-admins.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files were modified in the diff. The diff only touches frontend files (AdminInitButton.tsx, useQueries.ts, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json). There is no evidence of any backend audit or fix to the isAdmin/isCallerAdmin function or admin principal storage.
